sentences.en: a gentle shampoo for frequent washing
sentences.cn: 供经常洗发用的柔性洗发剂

sentences.en: Apply a dribble of baby shampoo.
sentences.cn: 抹一点儿婴儿洗发香波。

sentences.en: As with all oily hair treatments, shampoo needs to be applied first.
sentences.cn: 跟所有油性头发的护理一样，必须要先用洗发露。

sentences.en: How often do you shampoo your hair?
sentences.cn: 你多久用洗发剂洗一次头?

sentences.en: I pressed out the rest of shampoo by force.
sentences.cn: 我用力把剩下的洗发水挤出来.

sentences.en: I want to have a shampoo.
Massage the shampoo into the scalp.
sentences.cn: 通过按摩让洗发香波渗入头皮。

sentences.en: The shampoo lathers and foams so much it's very hard to rinse it all out.
sentences.cn: 这种洗发水泡沫太多，很难冲干净。

sentences.en: The wrong shampoo can leave curly hair in a tangled mess.
sentences.cn: 不合适的洗发水会使卷发纠结成乱糟糟的一团。

sentences.en: There was a sachet of shampoo in the bathroom.
This shampoo helps to get rid of scurf.
sentences.cn: 这种洗发剂有助于去头屑.

sentences.en: This shampoo smells fruity and leaves the hair beautifully silky.
sentences.cn: 这款洗发水是果香型的，洗后头发如丝般顺滑。

sentences.en: What kind of shampoo do you use?

trans.tran_cn: 洗发剂，洗发香波，（洗地毯、家具罩套、汽车等的）洗涤剂，洗头
trans.tran_en: a liquid soap for washing your hair

trans.tran_cn: 用洗发剂洗头，用洗涤剂洗
